rows.col_2: Provide model, funding, oversight. Expect execution, transparency.
Execute model, report daily, flag issues early. Expect support, clear guidance.
Validate work, ensure compliance. Expect documentation, access.
Provide evidence, accept feedback. Expect fair assessment, timely review.
Pay on time, clear specs. Expect quality, reliability.
Volume commitments, clear SLAs. Expect accuracy, speed.
